title: (x) Nova magazine masthead - Windsor Cd {JMC}
content:
hello all!   
   
im on the lookout for asny idea of what the typecae used in nova magazine was(the original ones from 1965-75). i am looking for the typeface that says "nova" in the masthead. i have a feeling it may have been made custom for their use, but its worth a shot...   
   
heres some examples:   
 ![nova 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221707im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70288.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221707im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70289.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Schützenbruderschaft St. Georgius - Capitals {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221707/http:/typophile.com/node/10453 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 1866 Lens 2 Go.com banner - Antique Olive, Helvetica, hand drawn {Dav, Mike, Jan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221707/http:/typophile.com/node/10448 "Go to next forum topic")
author: justin_kay
